content: folded shrug by angeline webb of knitrelief designs directions shrug is worked flat in one piece from lower back hem to upper front ribbing then folded and seamed lower hem co 93 sts work even in 1x1 rib for 11 row or until ribbing measures 2 from co edge ending after a ws row body row 1 rs k1 p1 twice yo k to last 4 sts yo p1 k1 twice 2 sts increase row 2 ws p1 k1 twice p to last 4 sts k1 p1 twice repeat row 1-2 until there are 213 sts on ndl ending after a ws row front collar ribbing work even in 1x1 rib for 34 row or until ribbing measures 6 bobble all sts loosely in patt size finishing one size lay piece flat fold top corners down so that top 2 of ribbed side edges a match side edges of lower yarn hem b sew side edges of lower hem to ribbed side approx 1 500 yards fingering yarn held double edges of body weave in ends sample shown in mary maxim twinkle 320yds/50g needles us 10 6 mm 48 circular needle gauge 16 sts and 22 row = 4 in stockinette st notions yarn needle folded shrug © 2025 angeline webb 1 common stitches & techniques abbreviations 1x1 rib flat over an odd number of sts bobble bind off row 1 k1 p1 to last st k1 co cast on row 2 p1 k1 to last st p1 increase increase d repeat row 1-2 for patt k knit ndl needle long tail cast on p purl fast and neat once you get the hang of it repeat repeat a tutorial can be found in this video rs right side st s stitch es stretchy bind off ws wrong side a tutorial can be found in this video yo yarn over you might also like for pattern support contact knitreliefdesigns@gmail com folded shrug © 2025 angeline webb 2
